reasoning: Second most common cancer in men globally. GLOBOCAN 2005 estimates ~680,000 new cases per year, approximately 25.3 per 100k population (both sexes) or ~50 per 100k men. High geographic variation: higher in developed countries.
source: Ferlay J et al. (2010). Estimates of worldwide burden of cancer in 2008: GLOBOCAN 2008. Int J Cancer. 127(12):2893-2917
